message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation rate will affect you more than me. Let's make this a win-win!
Let's try an even split this time.  We both lose value with each round, so a 50/50 split seems like the best way to maximize what we each get.  What do you say?
